name: Bombers One
desc: A flight jacket is a casual jacket that was originally created for pilots and eventually became part of popular culture and apparel. It has evolved into various styles and silhouettes, including the "letterman" jacket and the fashionable "bomber" jacket that is known today.

name: Harrington King
desc: A Harrington jacket is a lightweight, waist-length jacket made of cotton, polyester, wool or suede. Designs often incorporate traditional Fraser tartan or checkerboard-patterned lining.

name: Harrington Legacy
desc: A Harrington jacket is a lightweight, waist-length jacket made of cotton, polyester, wool or suede. Designs often incorporate traditional Fraser tartan or checkerboard-patterned lining.

name: Cool Dude
desc: A hoodie is a type of sweatshirt, jumper, or jacket that features a hood. The style is typically worn for casual wear or sportswear, for which people often partner it with sweat pants. The garment is a protective piece of outerwear that is both comfortable and warm with a fitted waistband and cuffs to trap heat.

name: Baby Shark
desc: Overall, the jackets were excellent and they kept the kids warm and dry. They were also great for playing; some coats might look good but are restrictive in the shoulders, or don't allow for many layers underneath.

name: Sweetshirt
desc: A hoodie is a sweatshirt with a hood. Hoodies often include a muff sewn onto the lower front, and a drawstring to adjust the hood opening.
